[[The 1982 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar]]

column1: '''''The 1984 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Ballantine Books]] in [[1983]]. It features art by [[Roger Garland]] based on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Silmarillion]]''.
